attributes.background: I propose that parents/guardians should be given two weeks a year where they can choose their own holiday dates during term time. The rest can be set by the school.This would help families afford a holiday out of the peak price times.

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/106133

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
